roleset.name: enter, go in

example.name: place entered as NP
example.text: An ambitious expansion has left Magna with excess capacity and a heavy debt load as the automotive industry re - enters a downturn .

example.name: place entered as a PP
example.text: The two concerns said they re - entered into a definitive merger agreement under which Ratners will begin a tender offer for all of Weisfield 's common shares for $ 57.50 each .
example.arg: into a definitive merger agreement under which Ratners will begin a tender offer for all of Weisfield's common shares for $57.50 each

roleset.note: REENTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 're-enter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 51.1, other framed members are 'leave'. Also comparison with 'go in'. (from reenter.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: submit again, cause to enter again

example.name: submit, transitive
example.text: On Oct. 19 , 1987 , [some investors]-1 learned the consequences of *trace*-1 re - entering `` good - til - canceled limit orders '' and then forgetting about them .

example.name: including manner
example.text: [A limit order]-1 to sell could be re - entered *trace*-1 at that price .

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: And even when a specific order is acceptable to an exchange , [a brokerage firm]-1 can refuse *trace*-1 to re - enter it for a customer .

example.name: dunno why Arg2 didn't show up
example.text: John re - entered his crayon drawings into an art competition .

roleset.note: REENTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 're-enter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 51.1, other framed members are 'leave'. Also comparison with 'go in'. (from reenter.02-v predicate notes)
